mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE, EMP_NAME, EMP_PASS, DEP_CODE, POS_CODE, PHONE_NUM, EXT_NUM, EMP_MAIL, COR_CODE, EMP_RRN FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_PASS = #{empPass}, DEP_CODE = #{depCode}, POS_CODE = #{posCode}, PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum}, EXT_NUM = #{extNum}, EMP_MAIL = #{empMail}, COR_CODE = #{corCode} WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
